changeSet.author: ovlajic
changeSet.sql: create sequence fundraising_proposal_document_seq; create table if not exists fundraising_proposal_document ( id bigint not null constraint fundraising_proposal_document_pkey primary key, title varchar(255), type_id bigint constraint fundraising_proposal_document_fk_on_type references company_document_type, upload_date timestamp, url varchar(255), fundraising_proposal_id bigint constraint fundraising_proposal_document_fk_on_fundraising_proposal references fundraising_proposal );
